mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

subSubSection.paragraph:
OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Dasychone bombyx (Dalyell, 1853 )
;
Sabella polyzonos
Grube 1863
.

bibRefCitation.author: Grube
bibRefCitation.refString: Grube, E. (1870) Neue Arten der Gattung Sabella. Jahresbericht und Abhandlungen der Schlesischen Gesellschaft fur Vaterlandische Cultur, Breslau, 48, 67 - 86.

subSubSection.paragraph:
LITERATURE
RECORDS
: Licciano et al . 2002 ;
Castelli et al . 2008
.

REMARKS : Alien species with Indo-Pacific origin (
Zenetos et al. 2010
). It was recorded for the first time in the Mediterranean Sea by
Giangrande ( 1989 )
from material collected by C.N. Bianchi during an expedition between
1978 and 1979
to Lucrino Lagoon (Naples) (
Bianchi 1983 b
).

Branchiomma maerli Licciano & Giangrande, 2008
DISTRIBUTION : NA .

bibRefCitation.author: Knight-Jones
bibRefCitation.refString: Knight-Jones P. (1994) Two new species of Branchiomma (Sabellidae) with descriptions of closely related species and comments on Pseudobranchiomma and Sabellastarte. Memoirs du Museum National d'Histoire Naturelle, Zoologie, 162, 191 - 198.
